name: TP Product Tooltip for WooCommerce
author: TP Plugins

sections.description:
TP Woocommerce Product Tooltip is a simple extension for your product page and product category.
You can easily add a beautiful designed Tooltip with every information you want!!
You can insert youtube video (PRO) to your Tooltip with nice icons on over and much more‚Ä¶

Learn more about TP Woocommerce Product Tooltip Plugin features.

DEMO

Click Here to Get the Pro Version

Plugin Features

  • Responsive Layout.
  • 100% mobile friendly.
  • Working with Most of Premium themes.
  • RTL support.
  • Support Product Video (YouTube).
  • Change Video Button Background.
  • Change Icons.
  • Customize Tooltip (Color/Background).

üëç You May Also Like

sections.installation:
1. Unzip the downloaded zip file.
  2. Upload the plugin folder into the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress site.
  3. Activate TP Woocommerce Product Tooltip through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

TP Woocommerce Product Tooltip will add a new menu item called ‚ÄúTP Woocommerce Product Tooltip‚Äù in wordpress menu. Here you are able to configure all the plugin settings.
sections.faq:
Do i need Woocommerce install in my site?

Of course, Our plugin works with Woocommerce so you need Woocommerce shop in your site.

What about mobile devices?

TP Woocommerce Product Tooltip is 100% Responsive and tested on any device and screen resolution.

I need a feature that you dont have

No problem! Contact Us Here and tell us what you need our team will be happy to help you.

Can I customize the Tooltip?

Yes you can, go to plugin Settings and change colors, background, icons and more…

1.0.0 – Released on 28 August 2020
